text: The Swiss Hotel Schools Association (ASEH), closed in 2017, had the responsibility to ensure professional and academic quality standards for Swiss hotel schools. The association established academic, professional and ethical standard and only accepted hotel management schools that met the standards. ASEH was supported by the two professional organizations GastroSuisse and Hotel & Gastrounion, which each had one representative on the committee. ==External links== *Official website Category:Hospitality schools in Switzerland Category:Educational institutions established in 1986
title: Swiss Hotel Schools Association (ASEH)
